cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 0 is invalid as MCC must be a 3-digit number from 001 to 999, causing PLMN configuration failure and gNB CU startup error.

du.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 0 is invalid as MCC must be a 3-digit number from 001 to 999, causing PLMN configuration failure and gNB DU startup error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 mcc 設定為 0 無效，因為 MCC 必須是從 001 到 999 的 3 位數字，會導致 PLMN 配置失敗並阻止 gNB DU 啟動。
